introduction: 塔林黑夜电影节主竞赛单元。What is at the core of life? Is it not one's drive to fulfil the heart's desires? But what if one's desire is constantly denied? How can a person hang on to sanity without giving in to obsession? In “Ten Months”, the filmmaker shows one of the strongest desires, a woman's innocent wish to be a mother and a series of events that challenge her on the way.After years of failed attempts, Merav finally succeeds in getting pregnant. But the pregnancy comes with unexpected news. To complete the pregnancy, Merav needs the support of her family, who refuses to accept the pregnancy and tries to terminate it with all means possible.
